title: How do I disable the key press sound？
answer:
1、The key press sound is related to the input method. In the specific input method menu,you can disable the key press sound.

Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115135736.PNG)> Settings > Language & keyboard. Select to set a text input method.  
2、Disabling the key press sound does not affect the incoming call ringtone and text message ringtone.
